order.ext_sys_guid: Order code in the external system
order.counterparty_ext_guid: Required. Counterparty code in the external system
order.wh_ext_sys_guid: Warehouse code in the external system

example.ext_sys_doc: Document code (order, receipt e.t.c.) in the external system. Required if no order block is specified
example.operation_ext_guid: Required. Code for recording transactions in the external system

items.goods_mu_ext_sys_guid: External unit code. Alternative parameter cod_kspovo
items.cod_kspovo: Code of the unit of measurement according to KSPOVO. An alternative parameter is mu_ext_sys_guid.
items.k: Conversion factor of the basic unit of measurement. For the base = 1

post.summary: Add device link. Device attachment to an employee or warehouse area

example.device: Required. Device ID that in some cases linked with related forklift
example.wh_ext_sys_guid: Required. Warehouse code in the external system
example.employee_ext_sys_guid: Required. Employee code in the external system
example.employee_id: Optional. Employee code in the external system
example.wh_area_ext_sys_guid: Optional. Warehouse area ID in the external system
example.date_start: Date / time of device link started. Format: 17.02.2020 17:00:59
example.date_end: Date / time of device link ended. Format: 17.02.2020 18:01:23
